docs.lead_paragraph: GLEN HEAD, L.I., Sept. 24.-- Jimmy Lee of Ridgefield, Conn., and Miss Fay Crocker, long-hitting star from Montevideo, Uruguay, today won the fifth mixed foursomes tourney, annual Fall fixture played at the famous Women's National Golf and Tennis Club.

docs.snippet: Copies of England's widely discussed "blacklist" containing the names of companies in all parts of the world that are regarded as her "enemies," because of alleged affiliation with German interests, reached foreign traders here yesterday.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Sept. 27--A recommendation that a government loan of $2,000,000 be made at once to Bolivia and a larger one to Colombia has been cabled to the State Department from Panama City by Under-Secretary of State Sumner Welles, chief of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 27--A recommendation that a government loan of $2,000,000 be made at once to Bolivia and a larger one to Colombia has been cabled to the State Department from Panama City by Under-Secretary of State Sumner Welles, chief of the United States delegation to the Pan-American conference on neutrality.
docs.abstract: Conf with W White on Latin Amer trade
